title: Black Reef
provenance_text:
Henry E. Mattson, Woodstock, NY, until December 1940; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1940 [3].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 363 (listed as "Lent by the Artist" and illustrated, plate 89) in the exhibition "Survey of American Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December, 1940. 
[2]. The Rehn Gallery acted as agent. See copies of correspondence between the museum and Frank Rehn in curatorial file (from Carnegie Institute Archive, AAA.)
[3]. The museum purchased the painting from the exhibition in Note [1] and accessioned it on December 6, 1940.

creator.death_place: Woodstock (Greene county, New York state, United States)
